name: Matchmove Games
overview:
MatchMove Games is a Singapore based online game service provider. We serve computer game enthusiasts across Southeast Asia, and are on track to becoming one of Southeast Asiaâ€˜s leading games providers.

We provide end-to-end entertainment solutions to major online brands by sourcing world-class game content, operating exciting game tournaments, enabling massive social gaming networks, and processing online payments in six countries.

With us, you can provide your consumers with an entertaining and unique venue where they can purchase or play games, make friends, virtual enemies and even take part in events with the chance to win prizes and recognition for their skills.

MatchMove Games has partnered with some of the very best game developers in the world. Our partners currently include developers like PopCap Games, Alawar Entertainment, Playrix Entertainment, Gamenauts, Ouat, and Digital Chocolate.

Our commitment to providing the very best games is not limited to obtaining content from famous developers. We are also dedicated to finding games from talented independent developers, and sharing them with enthusiasts across Southeast Asia!

funding_rounds.source_description: Vickers Capital Group makes significant investment in Matchmove Games
